uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar

Class App

  • uk.co.electronstudio.retrowar.App
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleApp

    public class App

    Main libgdx common application class. Created by platform specific launchers. Delegates actual rendering loop to Screens

    For most games you can use subclass SimpleApp rather than App directly.

    • Constructor Detail

      • App

        public App(Callback callback,
           Logger logger,
           ManualGC manualGC)

        Main libgdx common application class. Created by platform specific launchers. Delegates actual rendering loop to Screens

        For most games you can use subclass SimpleApp rather than App directly.

        Parameters:
        callback - For setting maximum FPS, platform specific
        logger - If debug is on then logs are sent here, which may send them to screen, file orcloud.
        manualGC - GDX on iOS has very poor garbage collection. Supply one of these to disableit and do your own GC. Otherwise null.
        callback - For setting maximum FPS, platform specific
        logger - If debug is on then logs are sent here, which may send them to screen, file or cloud.
        manualGC - GDX on iOS has very poor garbage collection. Supply one of these to disable it and do your own GC. Otherwise null.
